title: How to Make Honey Lemon Ginger Tea

steps.headline: Put the ginger in a small bowl and pour 1 cup of boiling water over it.
Allow it to steep for five minutes.
Add in lemon juice and honey.

text: Put the ginger in a small bowl and pour 1 cup of boiling water over it.  Allow it to steep for five minutes.  Strain it into a mug.  Add in lemon juice and honey.
